sentence.Network_en: The public may once have liked her, but her coyness and flirting now interfere with her interviews.
sentence.Network_cn: 公众也许曾经喜欢过她，但现在她的忸怩作态和卖弄风情让人们对她的采访大失所望。

sentence.Network_en: Had we but world and time, This coyness, lady, were no crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要我们世界大,时间多, 小姐, 羞怯就算不了罪过.

sentence.Network_en: Early this year the publication of commercial satellite imagery explained the coyness.
sentence.Network_cn: 今年早些时候公布的商业卫星图片解释了这种三缄其口.

PerfectNetExp.abs: littoral的意思中文翻译 ... coyly 害羞地, 羞怯地 coyness 怕羞, 羞怯.

RelatedPhrase.word: There is a natural coyness about her behavior

list.key: There is a natural coyness about her behavior
list.exp: 她的举止令人有种自然的羞答答的感觉
list.abs: 14) There is a natural coyness about her behavior. 她的举止令人有种自然的羞答答的感觉。 15) Try not to be so timid when you speak. 你讲话的时候.

entry.tran: (对爱情或性爱)害羞的，腼腆的，故作忸怩的，假装害羞的
entry.def: A coy person is shy, or pretends to be shy, about love and sex.

example.ex: She is modest without being coy...
I was sickened by the way Carol charmed all the men by turning coy.
example.tran: 卡萝尔忸怩作态勾引男人的样子让我恶心。

entry.tran: (因愧疚或难为情而)含糊其辞的
entry.def: If someone is being coy, they are unwilling to talk about something that they feel guilty or embarrassed about.

example.ex: The hotel are understandably coy about the incident...
example.tran: 酒店对那次事件不愿多说，这可以理解。

example.ex: Mr Alexander is not the slightest bit coy about his ambitions.
example.tran: 亚历山大先生对自己的抱负毫不隐讳。

means.word_mean: 1. the affectation of being demure in a provocative way

auth_sentence.content: This calculated coyness, it now seems, concealed quite a breakthrough.
auth_sentence.res_content: This calculated coyness, it now seems, concealed quite a breakthrough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This calculated coyness, it now seems, concealed quite a breakthrough.

auth_sentence.content: Because that coyness when it comes to teeth - certainly female - is rich in subtext.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because that coyness when it comes to teeth - certainly female - is rich in subtext.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because that coyness when it comes to teeth - certainly female - is rich in subtext.

auth_sentence.content: Had we but world enough, and time, This coyness, Lady, were no crime.
auth_sentence.res_content: Had we but world enough, and time, This coyness, Lady, were no crime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Had we but world enough, and time, This coyness, Lady, were no crime.
